long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your CS2 gaming experience with the FACEIT Map Picker extension! Designed to streamline the map selection process on FACEIT, this extension provides detailed stats, popular map choices, and real-time recommendations to help your team make informed decisions quickly.

Features:

Real-Time Recommendations: Get suggestions based on your teamâ€™s strengths and past performances to choose the best maps to pick or ban.

User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an intuitive UI that integrates seamlessly with FACEIT, making it easy to use for players of all levels.

Why Choose FACEIT Map Picker?
Inspired by community feedback and designed with competitive players in mind, this extension aims to improve your strategic decision-making and boost your chances of winning. 

Feedback and Support:
We value your input! If you have any feedback, suggestions, or encounter any issues, please reach out. Your feedback helps us improve and deliver the best experience possible.
